s1: The Grand Historian read the Spring and Autumn Annals, calendar records, and secret reports, and when he reached King Li of Zhou, he never failed to put down his book and sigh.
s2: He said: 'Alas, Shi Zhi foresaw it!'

s4: The Zhou way declined, the poets based it on the bed curtains, Guan Ju was made.

s6: When it came to King Li, because he hated hearing his faults, the dukes and ministers feared execution and disaster arose, King Li then fled to Zhi, chaos began from the capital, and the Gong He administered government.
s7: After this, some used force to govern, the strong oppressed the weak, raised troops without asking the Son of Heaven.
s8: However, upholding the righteousness of the royal house, to use punitive expeditions as alliance leaders, governance by the five hegemons, feudal lords acted wantonly, licentious and extravagant without standards, traitorous ministers and usurping sons arose increasingly.
s9: Qi, Jin, Qin, Chu were very small in the time of established Zhou, their fiefs were either one hundred li or fifty li.
s10: Jin blocked the three rivers, Qi backed the eastern sea, Chu bordered the Jiang and Huai, Qin relied on Yong province's defenses, the four seas rose in succession, became hegemonic lords alternately, the great enfeoffments praised by Wen and Wu, all awed and submitted to them.
s11: Therefore Confucius clarified the kingly way, sought audience with over seventy lords, none could employ him, therefore west observed the Zhou house, discussed historical records and old traditions, rose from Lu and arranged the Spring and Autumn, above recorded Yin, below to Ai's obtaining the unicorn, condensed its wording and style, removed its complications, to establish righteous principles, the kingly way complete, human affairs harmonious.

s13: The Lu gentleman Zuo Qiu Ming feared his disciples each had different theories, each satisfied their own intentions, lost the truth, therefore based on Confucius's historical records fully explained its words, completed the Zuo Family Spring and Autumn.
s14: Duo Jiao made transmissions for Chu Wei Wang, for the wang could not fully observe the Spring and Autumn, selected successes and failures, finally forty chapters, became the Duo Family subtle meanings.
s15: In Zhao Xiao Cheng Wang's time, his chancellor Yu Qing presented selections from the Spring and Autumn above, observed recent trends below, also wrote eight scrolls, became the Yu Family Spring and Autumn.
